HTMLMeterElementValue.summary: The value property of the interface represents the current value of the {{htmlelement("meter")}} element as a floating-point number. It reflects the element's value attribute. If no value is set, it is the value or 0, whichever is greater.

remarks.para: This property can also be set directly, for example to set a default value based on some condition.

HTMLMeterElementValue.value: A number. Defaults to either or 0, whichever if greater, if not defined.
